headlines.description: Chelsea held on for a 3-2 win at Crystal Palace to claim three crucial points in the race for a place in next season's Champions League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pulisic stars again as Chelsea edge out Palace

headlines.description: Danny Welbeck's spectacular bicycle kick propelled Watford to three vital points in their battle against Premier League relegation as they came from
headlines.shortLinkText: Welbeck wonder goal takes Watford away from drop zone

headlines.description: VAR took centre stage again as Jamie Vardy scored late to earn Leicester a 1-1 draw at Arsenal.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal rue VAR as Vardy earns late point
